mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX(rpt RPT ) INDEX(ifm IFM) */ rpt.individual_id AS 아이디, rpt.individual_name AS 이름, NVL(rpt.org_name, '없음') AS 소속, NVL(ifm.ACT_ID, '없음') AS 통신원코드, ifm.phone_cell as 연락처, COUNT(*) AS 월별제보건수, COUNT(*) * 2 AS 지급마일리지 FROM report_receipt rpt JOIN informer ifm ON ifm.informer_id = rpt.individual_id WHERE TO_CHAR(rpt.receipt_day, 'YYYY-MM') = #{START_DATE} AND rpt.region_id = #{AREA_CODE} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM mileage_history mh WHERE mh.start_date = #{START_DATE} AND mh.informer_id = rpt.individual_id ) GROUP BY rpt.individual_id, rpt.individual_name, rpt.org_name, ifm.phone_cell, ifm.ACT_ID ORDER BY 지급마일리지 DESC

mapper.select: SELECT MILE.INFORMER_ID, MILE.ACT_ID, IFM.INFORMER_NAME, NVL(IFM.ORG_NAME,'무소속') AS ORG_NAME, IFM.PHONE_CELL, MILE.ALL_MILEAGE FROM MILEAGE_INFO MILE JOIN INFORMER IFM ON IFM.INFORMER_ID = MILE.INFORMER_ID WHERE MILE.INFORMER_ID = #{ifmId}

SELECT MILE.INFORMER_ID, MILE.ACT_ID, IFM.INFORMER_NAME, NVL(IFM.ORG_NAME,'무소속')AS ORG_NAME, IFM.PHONE_CELL, MILE.CUM_MILEAGE, NVL(GRD.GRADE, '없음')AS GRADE, MILE.ALL_MILEAGE FROM MILEAGE_INFO MILE JOIN INFORMER IFM ON MILE.INFORMER_ID = IFM.INFORMER_ID LEFT JOIN GRADE_INFO GRD ON MILE.INFORMER_ID = GRD.INFORMER_ID WHERE MILE.INFORMER_ID = #{ifmId}
